results.title: Sam Altman Asserts Control of OpenAI as He Rejoins Its Board
results.abstract: Mr. Altman, whose sudden firing and rehiring in the fall shocked Silicon Valley, was among several new additions to the board announced on Friday.
results.byline: By Cade Metz, Tripp Mickle and Mike Isaac
org_facet: Wilmer Cutler Pickering Hale and Dorr LLP

multimedia.caption: In November, Sam Altman was briefly pushed out of OpenAI, a company he helped create. He returned as chief executive just five days later.
In November, Sam Altman was briefly pushed out of OpenAI, a company he helped create. He returned as chief executive just five days later.

results.title: Biden the President Wants to Curb TikTok. Biden the Candidate Embraces Its Stars.
results.abstract: At a party for social media influencers at the White House this week, President Biden’s political concerns collided with his national security concerns.

multimedia.caption: President Biden leaving the White House for the Capitol to give his State of the Union address on Thursday. Dozens of social media influencers — many of them TikTok stars — were invited to the White House for a watch party.

results.title: Apple Reverses Course and Allows Epic Games to Start Competing App Store
results.abstract: After an inquiry by European regulators, Epic Games said Apple would allow it to access the software tools necessary to develop a game store.

results.title: John Walker, Tech Executive Who Popularized AutoCAD, Dies at 74

results.title: Shafiqah Hudson, Who Fought Trolls on Social Media, Dies at 46

results.abstract: Bitcoin’s price surged above $69,000, breaking the record the digital currency set in November 2021 when the crypto industry was booming.

results.title: Tesla Halts Production in Germany After Suspected Arson
results.abstract: Police believe the blaze at a high-voltage power pylon had been deliberately set, amid turmoil over the automaker’s plans to expand its assembly plant near Berlin.

multimedia.caption: Police officers examining a damaged pylon near Tesla’s Gigafactory in Grünheide near Berlin. Tesla halted production and was left without power after suspected arson on Tuesday.
